titles.title: To codify procedures regarding naturalization ceremonies conducted by the Secretary of Homeland Security.
To codify procedures regarding naturalization ceremonies conducted by the Secretary of Homeland Security.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

bill.summary: Amends the Immigration and Naturalization Act to set forth naturalization ceremony provisions.
